entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023
